fallback.header: This website provides EU citizens a way to provisionally ‘opt-out’ from the EHDS
fallback.intro: Our mission is provide all EU citizens with a means to object to being registred in the European Health Data Space (EHDS). Please in by clicking <red>"Select Country"</red>  if it is available for your country or checkout the the <red>"about"</red> button  for more info.

p.0: The pdf files would be sent to a Dutch post provider Pingen(www.pingen.nl), which would send the letters.
p.1: In this demo you can download the generated pdf document.

p.0: The payments are done by the Mollie payment platform.
p.1: In the demo we use Ideal as a payment method.
p.2: Other options like credit card  are possible.

step1.title: Post Demo
step1.intro:
In this demo you fill in a form and based on your data this application creates a pdf file and it would be sent as a paper letter to the given address. By a mail provider Pingen. Before sending you must pay it by an online payment.

In this demo your data is not saved to our database and the payment is a demo and you don't have to pay anything.

step2.title: Select the company
step2.intro:
Type part of the name of the company or contact person to find it or fill in manually.
Forexampe: Coca Cola, KLM, Aracadi

Note: this data is not real.

step3.title: Your details
step3.intro: Your data is used for this process only stored only temporarily.

senderId.label: Last four digits of your BSN *

step4.title: Your Letter
step4.intro: Below you see the letter to be sent.

receiveACopy.mollie: After clicking  the 'Send it' button, in this demo payment please follow the steps below.
receiveACopy.title: 1) Select one arbitrary bank.

step5.title: Thanks for trying the demo.
step5.intro:
Your letter would be processed by the Dutch company Pingen.

In this demo you can download the pfd file by the button below.

stayInformed.title: Stay informed
stayInformed.text: Stay informed (English) of legislative changes that might affect your opt-out.

stayInformed.email_already_in_mailing_list: This email is already on the list.

notification.title: Help others with their privacy too!
notification.text: If you found this service useful, please share our website with your friends family or anyone who might benefit from it.

error.contact1: We will contact your soon to the following e-mail address
error.contact2: You can contact us with the e-mail mail@mail.com
